name: ClayFighter: Call of Putty
summary: ClayFighter: Call of Putty was an unreleased game for the Nintendo DSi and Wii. The game was going to be a remake of ClayFighter: Sculptor's Cut, with the same characters and stages, although much of the stages got redesigns. It was supposed to include a story mode, a training mode, and multiplayer mode where up to two players can fight, and Claytalities. The game's was planned to release in 2011 for DsiWare and WiiWare.
